game.name: SIDE EFFECTS
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 실험 대상 두 명. 한 건의 섬뜩한 임상 실험. 오직 한 명만 생존합니다. 한 번의 복용이 마지막이 될 수 있는 턴제 의료 룰렛 게임.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A twisted trial of pill roulette for up to 4 players (solo or online). Pick your poison. Use experimental items to shift the odds. And remember: only one of you can survive.

reviewHighlights.text: People leaving the game after they have one death is insane. The host does this to manipulate a win. I am hosting lobbys where I stay in the game but...
The best part is the pill mechanic, it's different enough to set itself apart from Buckshot but everything else is just lacking. There's a lot you cou...
